ShortDescription.Value: Check how your citizen navigates in your city

Publish.LongDescription:
## Navigation View Click the top-left button to enable. / 点击左上角按钮以启用。
Select a citizen / car to list routes, stops, means of transport and distance in a side view, resembling the navigation apps in their phone. / 选择一个市民或者车辆，像手机导航一样在旁边列出路线、站点、交通方式和距离。
Recommended to use with the [Cim Route Highlighter](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/76662/Windows) mod by mattswarthout. / 建议与 Cim Route Highlighter mod 一起使用。
Features: * List roads, paths, public transport routes and stops for your selected citizen * Grouped by means of transport * Configure the refresh frequency * Move the window around
